footer.text: Character Guide • Playstyle: Xilonen | Update Date: 10/10/2024 | Editor: talpha

description:
Xilonen is a defense scaling support that provides resistance shred and healing.
After unlocking ascension passive “Netotiliztli's Echoes”, press her skill, attack the enemies with her normal attack twice, after which her nightsoul points will reach maximum and Xilonen will activate her samplers, reducing enemies’ resistances to the elements of characters in your party. Keep in mind that to be able to do this, your party have to include at least 2 characters who's element can react with Geo element.

Her elemental burst provides different effects based on how many samplers were infused with elements:
- If there are at least 2 samplers infused with pyro/hydro/electro/cryo, your active character will receive continuous healing for 12s.
- If there are less than 2 samplers infused with pyro/hydro/electro/cryo, Xilonen will deal continuous geo damage.
title: Xilonen | Playstyle
